item.title: Hope in Every Package: Feeding 30 Poor Families in Besieged Gaza
item.dc:creator: YouFirstGaza
item.description:
In the midst of adversity and hardship, the You First Gaza organization has launched a compassionate campaign to raise funds for distributing food packages to 30 impoverished families residing in the besieged Gaza Strip. The situation in Gaza remains critical, with limited access to basic necessities, including food. “Hope in Every Package” is a heartfelt […]

The post Hope in Every Package: Feeding 30 Poor Families in Besieged Gaza appeared first on Donate.
item.content:encoded:
In the midst of adversity and hardship, the You First Gaza organization has launched a compassionate campaign to raise funds for distributing food packages to 30 impoverished families residing in the besieged Gaza Strip.

The situation in Gaza remains critical, with limited access to basic necessities, including food. “Hope in Every Package” is a heartfelt initiative that seeks to provide nourishment and solace to those who need it the most.

Each package will be thoughtfully assembled to include:

  • 2 kilograms of sugar
  • 2 kilograms of rice
  • 2 liters of cooking oil
  • 3.5 kilograms of onion
  • 3.5 kilograms of potato
  • Fresh Meat
  • Others

Each food package costs $30 and part of the donation goal amount will go to our team and work.

The distribution of food packages will be carried out with the utmost care and efficiency. Our team, You First Gaza, will ensure that these packages reach the designated families. The distribution process will be well-organized, and safety protocols will be followed to protect both recipients and volunteers.

You can contribute to the “Hope in Every Package” campaign by making a donation, sharing the campaign with your network, and spreading the word through social media. Every contribution, no matter how small, will make a significant difference in the lives of these 30 impoverished families in Gaza.

The “Hope in Every Package” campaign by You First Gaza embodies the spirit of compassion and solidarity. By supporting this initiative, you can play a crucial role in providing sustenance and hope to families enduring unimaginable hardships in the besieged Gaza Strip. Together, we can make a tangible impact, reminding those in need that they are not forgotten and that there is hope for a better future.

Our work in videos

Thanks in advance

The post Hope in Every Package: Feeding 30 Poor Families in Besieged Gaza appeared first on Donate.

item.title: Sadaqah Jariyah: A Battery for Mosque in Gaza
item.dc:creator: YouFirstGaza
item.description:
“When a son of Adam dies, then his good deeds stop except for three: a Sadaqah Jariyah (continuous charity), a beneficial knowledge, or a righteous child who prays for him.” – Prophet Muhammad (SAW) We are reaching out to you today on behalf of the Al-Quba Mosque in the Gaza Strip, which is at the […]

The post Sadaqah Jariyah: A Battery for Mosque in Gaza appeared first on Donate.
item.content:encoded:
“When a son of Adam dies, then his good deeds stop except for three: a Sadaqah Jariyah (continuous charity), a beneficial knowledge, or a righteous child who prays for him.” – Prophet Muhammad (SAW)

We are reaching out to you today on behalf of the Al-Quba Mosque in the Gaza Strip, which is at the heart of our community. Over the years, this sacred place has provided solace, guidance, and unity for hundreds of worshippers.

As you may be aware, the Gaza Strip has faced numerous challenges, including limited access to basic necessities such as electricity. Unfortunately, our beloved mosque has been severely impacted by the ongoing power crisis. The current battery system that sustains the mosque during power outages has deteriorated, making it increasingly difficult to carry out essential religious activities and community services.

We envision a vibrant mosque that serves as a beacon of hope and strength for the local community, but we need your help to make this vision a reality. By ensuring a reliable power supply, we can maintain the mosque’s activities and expand our outreach efforts to support those in need.

Join hands with us to raise funds for a brand-new and efficient battery system for our mosque. Your generous contribution will go a long way in making a significant impact on the lives of those who rely on this sacred space.

Breakdown of Costs

New Battery System: $400
(To ensure uninterrupted power supply during outages and pay some debts on the mosque)

Installation and our team’s work: $200

Every contribution, no matter the amount, counts and is deeply appreciated.

Your support for the Gaza Mosque: Powering Hope Campaign will profoundly impact countless individuals’ lives. Let us empower this sacred place to continue serving as a source of strength, spirituality, and unity for our community.

May Allah reward your kindness and generosity abundantly. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to contact us at info@gazayoufirst.org.

JazakAllah Khair for being a part of this noble cause.

The post Sadaqah Jariyah: A Battery for Mosque in Gaza appeared first on Donate.

item.title: Rebuilding Hope for a Hero in Gaza
item.dc:creator: YouFirstGaza
item.description:
Meet Mo’men, a 32-year-old courageous man from the Gaza Strip who has dedicated his life to serving humanity. For over 10 years, he selflessly volunteered with both the Red Crescent and our YouFirstGaza team, risking his life countless times to aid those in need. In 2018, Mo’men bravely faced bullets during the Great Return March […]

The post Rebuilding Hope for a Hero in Gaza appeared first on Donate.
item.content:encoded:
Meet Mo’men, a 32-year-old courageous man from the Gaza Strip who has dedicated his life to serving humanity. For over 10 years, he selflessly volunteered with both the Red Crescent and our YouFirstGaza team, risking his life countless times to aid those in need.

In 2018, Mo’men bravely faced bullets during the Great Return March and worked tirelessly to evacuate the injured on the eastern border of the besieged Gaza Strip as well as playing a vital role in aiding and helping people during the five devastating wars that have shaken Gaza.

Mo’men emerged as a true hero during the five wars that ravaged the Gaza Strip, displaying incredible bravery and selflessness. Without concern for his own safety amidst the chaos of bombings, death, and destruction, he fearlessly risked his life to save and evacuate the injured and deceased. Mo’men’s unwavering dedication and remarkable acts of heroism embody the spirit of resilience and compassion that defines the people of Gaza. His unwavering commitment to helping others, even in the face of immense danger, sets an inspiring example for all.

Today, we turn to you, our compassionate community, to help Mo’men rebuild his small house and create a secure home for his family. Despite his immense contributions, Mo’men’s financial means are extremely limited, as his volunteer work provided only minimal financial rewards. It’s time for us to rally together and extend our support to this remarkable individual who has selflessly served humanity.

Mo’men’s dreams of pursuing a collegiate education were hindered by the challenging economic circumstances that his family faced. Despite his aspirations and eagerness to further his studies, the financial strain on his family made it impossible for him to continue his education. Mo’men’s determination and resilience shine through, as he devoted his time and energy to helping others through his volunteer work instead. The difficult economic conditions may have momentarily halted his educational pursuits, but they have not dampened his spirit or commitment to serving humanity.

Completing Mo’men’s house construction requirements

Here is a list of the requirements and costs for completing Mo’men’s house construction:

  1. Pouring the kitchen ceiling with concrete: $280
  2. Plastering the walls in the house: $400
  3. Floor tiles and kitchen and bathroom walls: $1,500
  4. Plumbing and water supply at home: $300
  5. Electricity supply at home: $400
  6. Windows and doors for the house: $600
  7. Kitchen and sink ceramics: $600
  8. Work, transportation, and documentation: $920

Total cost: $5000

Please note that the project implementation period is estimated to be around two months.

By donating to our fundraising campaign, you can make a profound difference in Mo’men’s life. Your contribution will help rebuild his small house, enabling him to provide a safe and comfortable living environment for his family.

Additionally, it will help fulfill his dream of getting married, bringing joy and stability to his life after years of dedicated service to others.

Let us come together to honor Mo’men’s selflessness and bravery by showing him that his sacrifices have not gone unnoticed. Your support will empower Mo’men to rebuild, start a new chapter in his life, and continue his mission of serving humanity with renewed hope and strength.

Donate today and be a part of rebuilding hope for Mo’men in Gaza. Together, we can make a lasting impact and ensure that his tireless dedication to helping others is rewarded. Thank you for your generosity and compassion.

Note: All funds raised will go directly towards rebuilding Mo’men’s house and our team’s work expenses. We will provide regular updates to our donors, ensuring transparency throughout the process.

The post Rebuilding Hope for a Hero in Gaza appeared first on Donate.

item.title: Providing Clean Water to a Desperate Family in Gaza
item.dc:creator: YouFirstGaza
item.description:
Join us in making a significant difference in the lives of a poverty-stricken family in the Gaza Strip. We are running a fundraising campaign to support Mohamad, a hardworking 28-year-old man, and his family by providing them with access to clean water and helping them maintain their roof. With your generous contribution, we can transform […]

The post Providing Clean Water to a Desperate Family in Gaza appeared first on Donate.
item.content:encoded:
Join us in making a significant difference in the lives of a poverty-stricken family in the Gaza Strip. We are running a fundraising campaign to support Mohamad, a hardworking 28-year-old man, and his family by providing them with access to clean water and helping them maintain their roof. With your generous contribution, we can transform their lives and bring them the basic necessities they desperately need.

Background

Mohamad is a dedicated guard struggling to support his family on a meager salary of $200 USD per month. In the besieged Gaza Strip, poverty is widespread, and many families, like Mohamad’s, endure extreme hardship. Their living conditions are worsened by the lack of access to clean water, an essential resource for health and well-being. Moreover, their deteriorating roof poses a threat to their safety and security.

The Need

Our campaign aims to raise $600 USD to provide Mohamad and his family with clean water and repair their roof. This will significantly improve their living conditions, ensuring they have access to a basic human right while safeguarding their home against further damage.

Clean Water Solution

By installing water barrels in Mohamad’s home, we can ensure his family has access to clean, safe drinking water. These barrels will be properly maintained, allowing them to meet their daily needs and prevent potential health risks associated with contaminated water sources. Your support will go directly toward the purchase, installation, and maintenance of these barrels.

Roof Repair

The funds raised will also contribute to repairing and maintaining the family’s roof, preventing leaks and further deterioration. By addressing this urgent issue, we can provide a secure and comfortable living environment for Mohamad’s family, protecting them from the harsh weather conditions that often prevail in the Gaza Strip.

How You Can Help

Your contribution, no matter how small, can make a significant impact on Mohamad’s family. Here are a few ways you can support this campaign:

  1. Donate: Your generous donation will go directly towards the purchase of water barrels and the repair of the family’s roof. Even a small amount can make a difference in their lives.
  2. Spread the Word: Share our campaign on social media platforms, with friends, family, and colleagues. By increasing awareness, we can reach a broader audience and garner more support.
  3. Volunteer: If you have relevant skills or resources, consider volunteering your time or expertise to help with the installation of water barrels or roof repairs. Your hands-on involvement will be invaluable.
  4. Fundraising Events: Organize a fundraising event in your community, workplace, or school to raise funds for this cause. Every effort counts, and collective action can have a profound impact.

Read More: You First Gaza Installs Water Infrastructure for Impoverished Families in the Gaza Strip

Together, let’s uplift Mohamad’s family from the depths of poverty and provide them with clean water and a safe roof over their heads. By contributing to this campaign, you are not only giving them the means to survive but also restoring hope for a better future. Join us in this noble endeavor and make a lasting difference in the lives of those in need.

Donate today and be a part of transforming lives!

Note: All funds raised will be directed toward You First Gaza’s initiatives to help Mohamad and his family. Updates and progress reports will be shared with our generous donors to ensure transparency and accountability.

The post Providing Clean Water to a Desperate Family in Gaza appeared first on Donate.

item.title: Help the Poor in Gaza with 1 Kilo of Meat this Eid al-Adha
item.dc:creator: YouFirstGaza
item.description:
The You First Gaza team is thrilled to announce the launch of our special campaign aimed at supporting impoverished families with food during the auspicious occasion of Eid al-Adha in the Gaza Strip. In the Gaza Strip, many underprivileged families face the challenge of soaring meat prices, making it extremely difficult for them to provide […]

The post Help the Poor in Gaza with 1 Kilo of Meat this Eid al-Adha appeared first on Donate.
item.content:encoded:
The You First Gaza team is thrilled to announce the launch of our special campaign aimed at supporting impoverished families with food during the auspicious occasion of Eid al-Adha in the Gaza Strip.

In the Gaza Strip, many underprivileged families face the challenge of soaring meat prices, making it extremely difficult for them to provide an adequate diet for their children. The cost of a kilogram of fresh meat exceeds 50 shekels, equivalent to approximately 14 US dollars, which is far beyond the means of most individuals from these struggling families.

“In the realm of hardships, Gaza stands as a testament to resilience, where the price of fresh meat reflects the weight of struggle, making it the costliest place in the world. Yet amidst this economic burden, the spirit of its people remains unyielding, an enduring symbol of strength.”

With this campaign, our goal is to provide 1 kilogram of fresh meat to 45 impoverished families, filling their hearts with joy and happiness during Eid al-Adha. By donating today, you can play an essential role in making a significant difference in their lives. As always, all distribution details will be meticulously documented.

Last year, thanks to the support and generosity of individuals like you, our team successfully distributed 40 kilograms of fresh meat to deserving families on this special occasion. Together, let us continue spreading happiness and nourishing the children of these families.

To contribute to this meaningful cause, please consider making a donation today. Your support, no matter the size, will have a direct and tangible impact on the lives of those in need. Together, we can bring smiles to their faces and make this Eid al-Adha truly memorable.

Donate now and help us bring the joy of Eid to those who need it most. Together, we can make a difference!

Thank you for your generosity and may you have a blessed Eid al-Adha!

The post Help the Poor in Gaza with 1 Kilo of Meat this Eid al-Adha appeared first on Donate.
